org.drip.regression.spline

Class BasisSplineRegressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.regression.core.UnitRegressionExecutor
      • org.drip.regression.spline.BasisSplineRegressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UnitRegressor

    public class BasisSplineRegressor
extends UnitRegressionExecutor
    BasisSplineRegressor implements the custom basis spline regressor for the given basis spline. As part of the regression run, it executes the following: - Calibrate and compute the left and he right Jacobian. - Reset right node and re-run calibration. - Compute an intermediate value Jacobian.
